text:
Hello,
    This is regarding the timestamp comparion. I would appriciate if there is 
an option task for time stamp comparion. This is useful when we want to build a 
module we should compile only those files that has been changed and not all the 
files belonging to that module
creator: k_p_ani@mailingaddress.org

text:
What are you asking for?  See if either of <uptodate> or ant-contrib's 
<outofdate> will help you...
creator: mbenson@apache.org

text: Lacking any response on the <uptodate> suggestion, closing this report
creator: jkf@apache.org
